note: Polio is a highly infectious viral disease. The polio virus invades the nervous system and can cause irreversible paralysis.
title: Share of one-year-olds who received the inactivated polio vaccine
subtitle: The [inactivated polio vaccine](#dod:inactivated-polio-vaccine) (IPV1) protects children against polioviruses types 1, 2 and 3. IPV does not replace the [Oral Polio Vaccine](#dod:oral-polio-vaccine) (OPV), but is used with OPV to strengthen a childâ€™s immune system and protect them from polio.
